block.p: M.L.B.--Suspended minor league player Cedrick Brooks for 50 games for testing positive for a drug of abuse in violation of the Minor League Drug Prevention and Treatment Program.

American League YANKEES--Optioned RHP Colter Bean to Scranton-Wilkes Barre (IL). Purchased the contract of RHP Philip Hughes from Scranton-Wilkes Barre. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Activated 1B Dan Johnson from the 15-day DL. Optioned C Adam Melhuse to Sacramento (PCL). TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed G Gregg Zaun on the 15-day DL. Purchased the contract of C Sal Fasano from Syracuse (IL).

National League FLORIDA MARLINS--Purchased the contract of RHP Nate Field from Albuquerque (PCL). Transferred RHP Logan Kensing from the 15- to the 60-day DL. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed RHP Greg Aquino on the 15-day DL, retroactive to April 21.

International League INDIANAPOLIS INDIANS--Released RHP Jim Brower. Recalled C Einar Diaz from Lynchburg (Carolina). American Association EL PASO DIABLOS--Agreed to terms with RHP Ned Darley. LINCOLN SALTDOGS--Agreed to terms with OF Pichi Balet. ST. JOE BLACKSNAKES--Agreed to terms with INF Brian Rios.

Can-Am League NASHUA PRIDE--Traded LHP Aric Leclair to Camden (Atlantic) for future considerations. NEW JERSEY JACKALS--Agreed to terms with OF-1B Jeremy Pickrel. NORTH SHORE SPIRIT--Agreed to terms with OF Chad Gabriel.
Northern League EDMONTON CRACKER-CATS--Agreed to terms with RHP Juan Carlos Ovalles.
M.L.B.--Suspended minor league player Cedrick Brooks for 50 games for testing positive for a drug of abuse in violation of the Minor League Drug Prevention and Treatment Program.

American League YANKEES--Optioned RHP Colter Bean to Scranton-Wilkes Barre (IL). Purchased the contract of RHP Philip Hughes from Scranton-Wilkes Barre. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Activated 1B Dan Johnson from the 15-day DL. Optioned C Adam Melhuse to Sacramento (PCL). TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed G Gregg Zaun on the 15-day DL. Purchased the contract of C Sal Fasano from Syracuse (IL).

National League FLORIDA MARLINS--Purchased the contract of RHP Nate Field from Albuquerque (PCL). Transferred RHP Logan Kensing from the 15- to the 60-day DL. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed RHP Greg Aquino on the 15-day DL, retroactive to April 21.

International League INDIANAPOLIS INDIANS--Released RHP Jim Brower. Recalled C Einar Diaz from Lynchburg (Carolina). American Association EL PASO DIABLOS--Agreed to terms with RHP Ned Darley. LINCOLN SALTDOGS--Agreed to terms with OF Pichi Balet. ST. JOE BLACKSNAKES--Agreed to terms with INF Brian Rios.

Can-Am League NASHUA PRIDE--Traded LHP Aric Leclair to Camden (Atlantic) for future considerations. NEW JERSEY JACKALS--Agreed to terms with OF-1B Jeremy Pickrel. NORTH SHORE SPIRIT--Agreed to terms with OF Chad Gabriel.
Northern League EDMONTON CRACKER-CATS--Agreed to terms with RHP Juan Carlos Ovalles.
